College_Summary: IIM Shillong established in 2007 is a public management institution, affiliated with the North Eastern Hill University (NEHU). IIM Shillong has been ranked 26th among the top management institutes in India by NIRF Ranking 2023. The institute has a strong employment track record, with alumni being hired by top Indian and worldwide organisations. Check: Is IIM Shillong worth joining?

College_Summary: National Institute of fashion technology (NIFT) Shillong, a new entrant in the consortium of the NIFTs, was established in 2008. There are only 16 NIFTs in India, NIFT Shillong being one of them is a leader in the fashion education industry in the state of Meghalaya. Currently, the institute offers two four year UG programs- Fashion Design and Accessory design and one two year PG program- Master of Fashion Management. It is an autonomous institute and it is approved by the Ministry of Textiles, Government of India. NIFT Shillong is the first premier fashion institute in North East India. It was ranked 13th among all the participating institutes by the survey conducted by The Week in 2022.

NIT Meghalaya is one of the new IITs created in 2010 as an Institution of National Importance. NIT Meghalaya is currently operating out of its temporary site in Shillong. The permanent campus of NIT Meghalaya is being built in the city of Cherapunji. According to the NIRF Ranking 2023, NIT Meghalaya is rated 72nd among the engineering colleges in India. NIT Meghalaya also provides PhD, M.Sc., and M.Tech. programmes at the postgraduate level.

Martin Luther Christian University (MLCU) was established in Shillong, the capital city of Meghalaya in July 2005. The creation of the university is in accordance with the University Grant Commission (UGC). The university ranked 48th in the top 50 private universities in the country by Outlook, 2023. MLCU offers high-quality education that enables students to graduate as well-rounded professionals, ready to serve with purpose, integrity, and efficiency globally. Emphasizing Skills and Experiential Learning, MLCU provides hands-on development projects for students to acquire not just knowledge and skills but also the practical expertise necessary for pursuing rewarding and fulfilling careers.

College_Summary: CMJ University is a private university founded in the year 2009 at the Ribhoi district of Meghalaya. It is recognized by UGC & offers a variety of UG, PG, Doctoral & Diploma programs in the field of Engineering & Technology, Arts, Science, Commerce, Management, Health Sciences, Nursing, Law, Arts & Crafts, etc. The university boasts excellent infrastructural facilities to create a better learning atmosphere

North Eastern Hill University, popularly known as NEHU, is a public central university in Shillong, Meghalaya. Established in 1973, NEHU has two campuses, one at Mawkynroh-Umshing, Shillong, and another at Chasingre, Tura. The main campus is located in Shillong which is spread over 1225 acres of land. The university is recognized by the UGC and accredited with an ‘A’ grade by the NAAC. NEHU is ranked 80 among the top universities in India in NIRF Rankings 2023.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [BALLB] {Hons.}

College_Name: University of Science and Technology Meghalaya
College_Summary: The University of Science and Technology, also known as USTM in Meghalaya has been renowned for being the first Private University based on Science and Technology in North East India. Approved by UGC and AICTE, the university came into existence in the year 2008. The university has 11 undergraduate, 12 postgraduate, and 10 Ph.D. specializations. Admissions are done on merit basis for various UG and PG courses. Some courses need university prescribed entrance test merit marks. Admission to MBA is done via USTM-CAT followed by group discussion and personal interview. For selection to Ph.D., candidates are selected based on performance in academics, entrance tests, and interviews.
William Carey University was established in 2005 in Shillong. The University currently has 11 departments and offers 107 courses.

Established in 2010, Mahatma Gandhi University (MGU) is situated in Ri-Bhoi district of Meghalaya. Spread over a sprawling campus of over 15 acres, the college is one of the leading Universities in India. It is successfully running various Institutions in the discipline of Law, Arts, Science, and Commerce. It is approved by

Institute of Chartered Financial Analysts of India University (ICFAI), Meghalaya was established in 2005 and is approved by UGC. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Business Administration, Tourism Management, Computer Applications and Commerce. Admission to ICFAI University is done on the basis of CAT/MAT/IBSAT/AIMA UGAT scores. The candidates can apply for registration through online mode.

MIT University Shillong is a private university which was established in 2011. MIT University offers BBA, BA, B. Com and BCA, B. Des., LLB and BBA-LLB Integrated programs at the UG level, MBA, MCA at the PG level. Admission to MBA is one the basis of valid scores in CAT/CMAT/MAT/GMAT. MIT University is sponsored by the Maharashtra Academy of Engineering and Education Research and is managed by MIT Group of Institutions, Pune which provides 100% placement assistance to students. The strength of MIT Group of Institutions is its 4 Universities, 70+ institutions, 50000+ students, 3000+ faculty and 100000+ Alumni.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Tourism and Travel Management [BTTM]

College_Summary: Northeast Adventist College, Jaintia Hills was established in 1941 by the Pr. O.W Lange. The college is affiliated with North-Eastern Hill University (NEHU) and approved by AICTE. The college offers UG and PG degree courses in the discipline of Science and Commerce across various specializations. Admission to the courses is done based on candidate's previous exam scores.
St. Anthony's College offers courses at UG, PG levels. All these courses are provided in several departments like, Biochemistry, Commerce, Chemistry, Economics, English, Mathematics and a lot more.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications [PGDCA]

College_Summary: Umshyrpi College, Shillong, Meghalaya is a century old minority college that supports the education development program of the Muslim community in the northeastern region of Meghalaya. The College was recognized in the year 1994 and is guided by the Shillong Muslim Union. The mission statement of the college revolves around preparing students to face the challenges put forward by life with all their courage and dignity. The College offers pre-graduate and graduate honors programs in arts, science, and commerce.

Union Christian College, established in 1952 is a private college affiliated to NEHU, Shillong and is approved by UGC. The college offers UG hons. courses in Science, Arts and Commerce Stream. UCC also offers one certification course in 6 specializations including mushroom production, Apiculture, etc. Admission to the courses offered by UCC is done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination.

College_Name: Harding Theological College, West Garo Hills

College_Summary: The Institute of Hotel Management, Catering Technology and Applied Nutrition, Shillong, was established in 2001 in Meghalaya. IHM Shillong offers 3 undergraduate diplomas and one Bachelor of Science Course in Hospitality and Hotel Administration. Admissions to the diploma programs are made on the basis of the merits achieved by the applicant in the qualifying examination i.e. the 12th Board Examinations. Admissions to the B.Sc course is made on the basis of the rank received in the NCHMCT JEE Exam

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] (Hospitality and Hotel Administration)

College_Name: Montfort Centre for Education, West Garo Hills
St Mary's College of Teacher Education, Shillong
English and Foreign Languages University - [EFLU], Shillong
College_Summary: English and Foreign Languages University Shillong Campus was started as Central institute of English and Foreign Languages. It was established with an aim of cater the linguistic and research needs and also to provide high quality training for teachers. University has cultural diversities as students in campus come from various parts of country.

Shillong College is a private college in Meghalaya which was established on August 15, 1956. The college offers popular Undergraduate level programs with various specializations including Business Administration, Science, Commerce, IT Humanities or Arts, and Mass Communication. The admission for all the popular courses like BBA, BCA, B.Com, B.A., etc. is done based on the merit in the qualifying examinations. Students can apply for admission through the online and offline modes of the application process. Check Shillong College Admission

Techno Global University (TGU) was established in the year 2008 by Meghalaya State legislative Act, 2008. It is a private university located in Shillong, Meghalaya. The university is also recognized by UGC. Techno Global University is a large lush-green campus equipped with all the facilities needed for the students. Techno Global University offers postgraduate courses including M.Phil and Ph.D. programmes in various academic disciplines i.e. Arts, Humanities, Science, Social Sciences, Commerce, Education, Engineering, Management, Computer Applications, Pharmacy, Allied Health Sciences, Journalism & Mass Communications, and other relevant subjects. TGU is associated with two foreign universities Colorado Heights University and Northwestern Polytechnic.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] + Master of Science [M.Sc] (Agriculture)

College_Summary: North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Science (NEIGRIHMS) is a medical institute located in Shillong, Meghalaya. The institute was established in the year 1987 by the Government of India. NEIGRIHMS is an autonomous institute under the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India. The institute is affiliated with North Eastern Hill University, (NEHU Shillong. NEIGRIHMS offers UG, PG and Super-Speciality Courses in various specializations. It also offers B.Sc and M.Sc in Nursing for eligible candidates.

College_Name: Regional Institute of Science and Technology - [RIST], Ri-Bhoi
Indian Institute of Public Health - [IIPH], Shillong
College_Summary: Indian Institute of Public Health (IIPH) Shillong was established by the Public Health Foundation of India (PHFI) in collaboration with the Government of Meghalaya (GoM). The institute aims to redress the limited institutional and systems capacity in public health in the northeast region of India. The institute offers a full-time two-year Master's degree program in Public Health. Apart from IIPH Shillong, the institute has a campus situated in the following cities:

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Public Health

College_Summary: St. Edmund's College, Shillong, established in 1923, is one of the premier institutions in North East of India and Meghalaya. It offers undergraduate courses in the discipline of Arts, Commerce, Social Work, Science. Admission to St. Edmund College is based on the performance of the candidates in the previous qualifying examination. The faculty at the college are highly qualified and well experienced. Check: St. Edmund’s College Courses and Fees

Nongtalang College, established in 1988, is a private college affiliated to North-Eastern Hill University (NEHU), Shillong. It is recognised by UGC under section 2(f) and 12B and accredited by NAAC with a grade “B”. It offers a number of courses in the field of Arts. It focuses both on academic as well as personality development of the students. The experienced and qualified faculty of Nongtalang College along with the carefully designed and updated curriculum ensure that the students receive the best quality of education which help them to emerge as qualified professionals.

Kiang Nangbah Government College, established in 1967, is affiliated to the North Eastern Hill University, Shillong and approved by AICTE. The college offers UG degree courses in the discipline of Arts, Science and Commerce across 12 specializations including languages like Khasi and English, Political Science, Economics, Zoology, Physics, etc. Candidates are selected for KNGC’s courses based on their performance in previous examinations.

North Eastern Institute of Ayurveda and Homeopathy, Shillong was established in the year of 2008, affiliated to North-Eastern Hill University (NEHU), Shillong. It offers undergraduate courses in the field of Ayurveda and Homeopathic Medicine. Admission to NEIAH depends on the performance of the candidates in NEET. The faculty at the institute are highly qualified and experienced.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery

College_Summary: K.L. Bajoria College (KLBC), Shillong is a self-financed and privately managed institution established in the year 2004. It is affiliated to North Eastern Hill University and recognized by UGC. The college provides a co-educational curriculum and it is sponsored by the K.L. Bajoria non-profitable trust. The college offers many undergraduate courses in the discipline of Arts such as English, Political Science, History, Economics, Sociology and Education. Admission into the KL Bajoria College is done purely on merit basis. The marks scored in the previous qualifying examination are taken into account while offering admission into the undergraduate programs. The college has a group of highly qualified and experienced faculty.

College_Name: Kazi & Zaman College - [KZC], West Garo Hills

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Hotel Management & Catering Technology

College_Name: Mount Olive Culinary Art and Hospitality Management - [MOCAHM], Shillong

College_Summary: National Law University is a Shillong-based University which was founded with the aim to provide best quality Law education and make youths ready for an unpredictable society. The University offers Integrated and Interdisciplinary Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses across various disciplines like General and Corporate Law, Science, Data Science, Arts and Business Administration, etc.
